author: Prajwal Bhattarai
title: Streets of Kathmandu - Saturday Features - The Kathmandu Post
text:
- Prajwal Bhattarai , Kathmandu Khicha Pokhari, Katmandu. October 30th, 2016 
Feb 11, 2017- Streets Kathmandu is a never ending, non-narrative collection of photographs from in and around Kathmandu, that I have been taking since a few years back. These are nothing more than tiny moments of everyday Kathmandu that I happen to encounter. Bangalamukhi, Lalitpur. August 29th, 2015 
Basantapur, Kathmandu. September 13th, 2016 
Bhaisepati, Lalitpur. October 4th, 2016 
Basantapur, Katmandu. December 17th, 2016 
Chyasal, Lalitpur. August 27th, 2016 
Gaurighat, Katmandu. November 7th, 2016 
Chikamugal, Kathmandu. February 1st, 2017 
Khicha Pokhari, Katmandu. October 30th, 2016 
Khokana, Lalitpur. November 5th, 2016 
Jawalakhel, Lalitpur. October 12th, 2015 
Pashupati, Kathmandu. October 12th, 2016 
Nyatapole, Bhaktapur. November 18, 2016 
Pashupati, Kathmandu. November 7th, 2016 
Mangalbazaar, Lalitpur. December 25th, 2016 
Makhan, Kathmandu. December 27th, 2016 
Mangalbazaar, Lalitpur. December 25th, 2016(1) 
Basantapur, Kathmandu. February 1st, 2017
